ResourceHeader.Description: The Townsville Ionosonde station near Townsville, Queensland, Australia, has ionosondes since June of 1946. They are IPS 4D between 05/1994 and 12/2001, IPS 5A between 01/1991 and 09/1998, CADI between 09/1998 and 08/2000, IPS 5D since 08/2000 to now. The ionosonde information before 01/1991 is not avaiable. The IPS 5D vertical sounding ionosondes normally sweep in frequency from about 1 to 21.5 MHz. Frequency step resolution for the 5D is 5kHz, with up to 4095 steps available. The step interval is variable, becoming more coarse at higher frequencies as ionograms are generally displayed on a logarithmic scale. See details at http://www.sws.bom.gov.au/World_Data_Centre/2/1/5
